participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Insecure and introverted, she often struggles to connect with others and feels out of place in social situations.
participant_1.background: i don't have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient and determined, she has overcome many challenges in her life and is passionate about helping others.
participant_2.background: i was born in somalia. my aunt helped me escape when i was a child. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was 15.

content.text: I was born in somalia, and where are you from?
my aunt helped me escape when i was of. and now i live in the united states. Do you want to go to somalia?
i was forced to marry when i was 15. How old are you?
